sentences.en: “By his mid-teens, Liszt had three years of intensive concertizing under his belt”(&b{Musical Heritage Review})
sentences.cn: “到十五、六岁时，李斯特已经有了三年严格的音乐会独奏经历”(&b{音乐精品回顾})

sentences.en: America’s farming belt
sentences.cn: 美国农业区

sentences.en: Do you think it's a bit below the belt what they're doing?
sentences.cn: 你觉得他们的做法是不是有点儿不太光明正大？

sentences.en: Gus already had a large brandy under his belt.
sentences.cn: 格斯已经喝下一大杯白兰地。

sentences.en: He became a model of clean living and Bible Belt virtues.
sentences.cn: 他成了洁身自好、恪守“圣经地带”德行的典范。

sentences.en: He grew up in the comfort of the Surrey stockbroker belt.
sentences.cn: 他在萨里市郊富人聚居区的舒适环境中长大。

sentences.en: He holds a black belt in karate.
sentences.cn: 他是空手道黑带级选手。

sentences.en: He is a black belt in karate.
sentences.cn: 他是空手道黑带选手。

sentences.en: he now has almost a year as minister under his belt.
sentences.cn: 他在部长的位子上已经稳坐了将近一年。

sentences.en: He unbuckled his leather belt.
sentences.cn: 他解开皮带。

sentences.en: He unbuckled his seat belt.
sentences.cn: 他解开了坐椅安全带。

sentences.en: He's a judo black belt but he says he deplores violence.
sentences.cn: 他是一名柔道黑带选手，但他说自己强烈反对暴力。

sentences.en: His gut sagged out over his belt.
sentences.cn: 他肚子上的赘肉堆在皮带上方。

sentences.en: I opened my coat and let him see the belt.
sentences.cn: 我解开外衣，让他看那条皮带。

sentences.en: I rigged myself out in thick jeans and heavy belt.
sentences.cn: 我穿上厚厚的牛仔裤，系上重重的皮带。

sentences.en: It was taken right there on a conveyor belt.
sentences.cn: 它被传送带直接送到了那边。

sentences.en: The car seat belt slotted into place easily.
sentences.cn: 汽车坐椅安全带很容易扣上。

sentences.en: The fact I was wearing a seat belt saved my life.
sentences.cn: 我系着安全带，所以幸免于难。

sentences.en: They feel scared and powerless in conveyor-belt hospital wards.
sentences.cn: 在千篇一律的病房里，他们感到恐惧而又无能为力。

sentences.en: This will cause further belt-tightening in the public services.
sentences.cn: 这会导致公共事业单位进一步紧缩开支。

words.tran_cn: 佩礼带的；束带的；装甲的
带类；制带的材料；调带装置
系上腰带；用带系上（belt的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 不正当地：不遵守规则地；不公平地
(英)（政策或行动）双重保险的，稳妥可靠的
带式输送机；皮带运输机
皮带运输机，带式运输机
高声而有力地歌唱（或演奏）
[柔道或空手道]黑带；黑人聚居区
减少开支，勒紧裤腰带；省吃俭用
获得，经历，掌握：在某人的占有物或经历中
（食品或饮料）被消费掉了的，已经下肚的

trans.tran_cn: 腰带，传送带，地带，猛击，（柔道等）段
trans.tran_en: a band of leather, cloth etc that you wear around your waist to hold up your clothes or for decoration
to fasten something with a belt
